summary: I HAVE A 1999 HONDA ODYSSEY WITH 65,000 MILES ON IT. OUR CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AND I WAS TOLD BY A TRANSMISSION SHOP THAT THE DIF. BEARINGS WERE FAILING AND CAUSING THE SOLENOIDS TO MALFUNCTION. THEY SAY I NEED A TOTAL TRANSMISSION REBUILD. I HAVE FOUND THAT THERE ARE MANY MANY MORE OUT THERE WITH THE SAME PROBLEM. I AM PURSUING HONDA TO COVER THE REPLACEMENT BECAUSE IT IS OBVIOUSLY A UNDER ENGINEERED / DEFECTIVE DESIGN.   *NLM
